message: Bob, I'm feeling generous today. Take this offer and we can both move on!
Let's split it fairly, 60% for me since I'm taking the risk of inflation!
Bob, inflation is only going to get worse for you. Let's be reasonable and close this deal now.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make up for the lost value!
Bob, this is my final offer.  Take it before inflation eats away even more of your potential gains!
